feature.name: Directional Interference Mitigation
feature.summary: The feature introduces horizontal and vertical spatial null steering on the configured

parameters.name: Frequency
parameters.type: frequency member of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.elevationNull or the                                         NRSectorCarrier.azimuthNull attributes(1)

parameters.name: Null width
parameters.type: nullWidth member of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.elevationNull or the                                         NRSectorCarrier.azimuthNull                                     attributes

parameters.name: Horizontal angle
parameters.type: horizontalAngle member of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.azimuthNull attribute

parameters.name: Vertical angle
parameters.type: verticalAngle member of the                                         NRSectorCarrier.elevationNull or the                                         NRSectorCarrier.azimuthNull                                     attributes

parameters.name: CommonBeamforming.coverageShape
parameters.description: To use the feature, this attribute must be set to                                     MACRO_1.

parameters.name: CommonBeamforming.customComBfwWideBeam
parameters.description: To use the feature, this attribute must be empty.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012536 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012536 MO instance.
